IntegrateBastion.Name: Integrate with Bastion Turns
IntegrateBastion.Hint: Automatically process venture results when D&D5e bastion turn summaries are created.

PostChatSummary.Name: Post Venture Summary Cards
PostChatSummary.Hint: Create a venture summary chat card after each bastion turn.

HideVentureHirelings.Name: Hide Venture Hirelings
HideVentureHirelings.Hint: When enabled, venture-enabled facilities hide bastion hireling slots.

DebugLogging.Name: Enable Debug Logging
DebugLogging.Hint: If enabled, the module writes debug messages to the browser console.

Sheet.EnabledHint: If enabled, this special facility resolves venture profit/loss each bastion turn.
Sheet.AutoCoverLossHint: When enabled, venture deficits are paid from the actor's GP before degradation.
Sheet.BoonsHint: Configured boons: {count}. Format each line as Name | Cost | Description | Reward UUID (optional) | Purchases Per Bastion Turn (optional; default 1, use 'unlimited' for no cap) | Purchase Window (optional: default, loss, profit).
Sheet.BoonsDropHint: Tip: drag an Item or Active Effect onto the boons field to insert an @UUID reward reference.

Chat.Title: {actor}'s Venture Results
Chat.NetLine: Income: {income} gp | Outgoings: {outgoings} gp | Net: {net} gp | Treasury: {treasury} gp
Chat.BoonPurchaseWindowBlocked: Not purchasable this turn due to purchase window ({mode}).
Chat.DeficitCovered: Remaining deficit of {character} gp was automatically covered from character funds.
Chat.DeficitCoveredManual: {decider} chose to cover the remaining {character} gp deficit from character funds.
Chat.DeficitSources: Loss coverage used {treasury} gp from venture treasury and {character} gp from character GP.
Chat.DeficitDeclined: {decider} declined to cover this venture's deficit.
Chat.DeficitTimedOut: No response from {decider}; deficit coverage timed out.
Chat.DeficitInsufficient: Insufficient character GP to cover the remaining {deficit} gp deficit.
Chat.Grew: Venture momentum increased. Profit die improved.
Chat.Failed: The venture failed and has been disabled.

BoonEditor.Title: Edit Venture Boons
BoonEditor.Help: Manage boon entries in a table. Empty names are ignored when saving. Drag an Item or Active Effect onto a Reward field to insert a UUID link. Purchase Window controls when the boon can be bought; break-even qualifies as both profit and loss.
BoonEditor.Name: Name

Actor: {actor}
Venture: {venture}

Available Character GP: {availableGp} gp

Errors.GMOnly: Only a GM can purchase venture boons.
Errors.NotEnoughTreasury: This venture does not have enough treasury for that boon.
Errors.NoTreasury: This venture has no treasury to claim.
